title: muruganai nI anudinamum
sahitya:
muruganai nI anudinamum ninai nenjE cancalam tIrum


anupallavi

  shaNmukha nAthan sharavaNa jAtan carAcarangaLum Ettum


caraNam 1    shIrAr pazhani tunga malaiyil vaLar tanga mayil vAhana vElA
 shambhu kumAra umaiyAL bAlA guhA guhA ena anbAi
  caraNam 2    dEvargaL tuyarara virinda neTrik-kaNNIlezhum kumArA
 vaLLi maNALA sharaNam sharaNam dInadayALA dInadayALA
 malaraDi tuNai ena nambi mAlOn mAl marugOnE
